Module org.nasdanika.exec
Package org.nasdanika.exec.content

Interface Interpolator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Adaptable, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, Filter, Marked, Marked, ModelElement, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InterpolatorImpl
    public interface Interpolator
extends Filter
    A representation of the model object 'Interpolator'. Converts input stream to String using the context charset, which defaults to ``UTF-8``, interpolates, and converts back to input stream using the context charset.

    The following features are supported:

    • Process Includes
    • Base
    See Also:
    ContentPackage.getInterpolator()

      • getBase

        String getBase()
        Returns the value of the 'Base' attribute. The default value is "". Optional base URL for resolving include and image URL's. If the base is blank then marker location is used as the base, if marker is present and location is not null. Otherwise, resource URL is used as the base. Marker location is the URL of a YAML resource from which interpolator specification was loaded. It may be different from the resource URL if a model was loaded from YAML and then saved to XML. If the base is not blank then it is resolved relative to the marker location if it starts with ``./`` and marker location is not null or the resource base otherwise.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Base' attribute.
        See Also:
        setBase(String), ContentPackage.getInterpolator_Base()

      • setBase
